sentences.sContent: Next, move to the diagonal section at the back-right side of the diamond.
sentences.sContent_eng: Next, move to the diagonal section at the back-right side of the diamond.
sentences.sCn: 下一个,在钻石的背面-正确的边移到对角线的区段。

sentences.sContent: And then there is this group of about half a dozen right down the diagonal middle.
sentences.sContent_eng: And then there is this group of about half a dozen right down the diagonal middle.
sentences.sCn: 然后有一个包含六个元素的元素组,在周期表的对角线的中部。

sentences.sContent: The average reader reads about 240 words per minute, where as a diagonal reader ‘reads’ (actually scans) closer to 15 words per second or about 900 words per minute.
sentences.sContent_eng: The average reader reads about 240 words per minute, where as a diagonal reader ‘reads’ (actually scans) closer to 15 words per second or about 900 words per minute.
sentences.sCn: 一般读者每分钟阅读240字，而作为一个对角线读者的“阅读速度”（到不如说是浏览）接近每秒15字或大约每分钟900字。

synos.tran: 斜的；[数]对角线的；斜纹的

remMethod.val: dia(穿过) + gon(角) + al → 穿过中心的角 → 斜线， 对角线

words.tran: 斜向移动；循对角线方向移动
与…斜向地成一行；使对角线化
